mapper.select: select HrbId, HrbName, mng, caution, internal, external, fsImg_1, fsImg_2 from Herb LEFT OUTER join InternalC on Herb.inid=InternalC.inid LEFT OUTER join ExternalC on Herb.exid=ExternalC.exid INNER JOIN Plants ON Plants.pNum=Herb.pNum
select Herb.HrbId, cName From Country, Cont, Herb where Country.cId=Cont.Cid and Herb.HrbID= Cont.HrbID ORDER BY Herb.HrbID
